How to play Run 3?

                                Space or Up arrow to jump

long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fil,lt,lv,pt:
Run 3 World Online Game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Run 3 World Game for free on your pc/mobile.

Run 3 is an endless runner game where you need to navigate your little alien through space. Run 3 was created by Joseph Cloutier and is the third installment in the Run game series. Run 3 is now available in HTML5, so you can play without Flash support. You can play the online game for free on your PC.

How to play Run 3?
                                 
                                Arrows to move
                                Space or Up arrow to jump
                                R to reset
                                 P to pause the game

Note:- In My Extension have Many more Additional Games with Different Type Categories like - Arcade, Shooting, Girls, Dressing, Adventure, Etc

thank you :)
